channel.title: War of Immortals
channel.description:
Does anybody else play this? Does your screen flicker a lot while moving around also? Trying to fix it on my computer and not really sure what is causing it. I have been in contact with the support team and they say my specs should be okay for the game 0.o
http://snpr.cm/jduuWe.png

item.title: War of Immortals
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:2, topic:433738”]Try to run an update for your graphics card maybe? I’m not to great with graphic sided problems. :P[/quote]I have already updated it all 100%
